metadata.title: Effect of continuous renal replacement therapy on all-cause mortality in COVID-19 patients undergoing invasive mechanical ventilation: a retrospective cohort study

abstract.original_text: Wuhan and rapidly spread throughout the world, critically ill patients have a high mortality rate.

critically ill patients have a high mortality rate .

abstract.original_text: We aimed to assess the effect of continuous renal replacement therapy (CRRT) on all-cause mortality in patients with COVID-19 undergoing invasive mechanical ventilation.
